translations: n.（旧时或贫穷国家的）农民，佃农；<非正式>没教养的人，粗人

sentences.sentence: That forced peasant farmers to try to eke a living off steep hillsides.
sentences.translation: 那迫使农民要靠在陡峭的山坡上来勉强维持生计。

sentences.sentence: He was born of a peasant family.
sentences.translation: 他出生于一个农民家庭。

sentences.sentence: He was a peasant in his early years.
